scripts.copy:assets: mkdir -p dist/js && cp src/*.html dist/ && cp -r src/css dist/ && cp -r src/public/* dist/
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run copy:assets && npm run build:js
scripts.watch: npm run build && concurrently "chokidar 'src/**/*.html' 'src/**/*.css' 'src/public/**/*' -c 'npm run copy:assets'" "esbuild 'src/js/**/*.ts' 'src/js/**/*.js' --bundle --outdir=dist/js --outbase=src/js --format=esm --watch"
